This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste.
